page.title: 09Attractions at Camperdown
page.content: In{Camperdown Adventure Playpark}there is an ornate setting of old ships.The Manpower Services Commission chose ships set realistically on a bed of sand for a special reason.The Earl of Camperdown, from whom the park and the Earl take their title,won a great victory at the "Battle of Camperdown". This battle was between the British and Dutch navies and this is the reason why the Union Jack and the Dutch flag are displayed on the masts of the ships.The playpark has been built to a high standard, with little ships for toddlers and larger frigates incorporating death slides,climbing frames and chutes. Further south is{Camperdown Caravan {Park.}It is in a country setting surrounded by bushes,flowers and trees.Campers can also be accomodated. Who could ask for anything more?
